lenders.loan_because: everyone who wants to change their life for the better should be given the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Sherri

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm retired.  I do some volunteer driving for local agencies.
I travel a bit.  I'm dabbling in family history research.
I read.  I watch.  I try, more or less unsuccessfully, not to judge.

I play a lot of Free Cell on the computer.

I listen to most kinds of music.

I've been into digital photography for ten years or better, but I don't do much picture taking any more.

lenders.name: Jaume
lenders.loan_because:
I do believe in the entrepreneurial spirit of people. We should give the chance to those people who don't have access to financial sources to achieve the minimum quality of life they deserve.
Everybody needs an oportunity, and two as well!

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Because it's the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like encouraging and empowering people to reach for their dreams and make a better life for themselves and our planet.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: My friend Lolo lassoed me into doing this. After saying that, I really do believe that as individuals we can help impact that live of other people around the world, even if it is one small loan at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse in a neonatal intensive care unit helping to care for premature and sick babies. I love what I do and I work with a great group of people. What else could you ask for?

lenders.name: Vanessa

lenders.name: Joshua

lenders.name: Vast Media LLC

lenders.occupational_info: I don't work yet ;) But I do help out sometimes, and I save up a little of what I earn, and that I use to lend out through kiva. I also wish I could ask them questions sometimes..:) I think of going to some of the places where they life when I get older. When i grow up I think I will be a scientist, or a vet or a marine biologist... But it has to be something traveling around the world doing my job! :)

lenders.occupational_info: I sell movies and TV shows.

lenders.name: TONY/SUE
lenders.loan_because: WE DID SOME TRAVEL THIS YEAR  AND SAW HOW HARD IT WAS FOR SOME PEOPLE THAT LIVE in LESS FORTUNATE COUNTRIES. WE HOPE OUR LOAN  CAN HELP
lenders.occupational_info: WE BOTH WORK FOR A MINING COMPANY

lenders.name: Tien
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Education

lenders.name: Mariza
lenders.loan_because: I love this life and I want to help others feel the same way.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform investigations and write reports to help protect people from bad medicine.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning out my money again and again!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office as a secretary.  I am also a hobby beekeeper.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I am a small-struggling home business owner, growing food and flowers and creating art.  I want to feel close to someone in another country doing the same.  I have kids and I struggle financially, but I am very, very well provided for by four friends in particular who help me through.
lenders.occupational_info:
My _primary_ work is as a student, working at getting my 4-year degree and then a Master's, for Art Therapy.
 
My home business is also my work.  This year, for example, I was able to harvest 25lbs of Jerusalum Artichokes, and then sell them to a local health food store for $55.  Sometimes I am able to sell lavendar, or some of my photo-art.

lenders.name: katie
lenders.loan_because: it is the best way to give because you can do it over and over again!
lenders.occupational_info: i do what people might calling learning--cramming my head with useless information until the day of a test, then letting it all pour out until there's nothing left of me but a bottomless pit which i fill with delicious vegan food

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: My brother was in Uganda for Kiva and turned me on to what a huge difference a small loan can make!  Thanks Bill!

lenders.name: Roko
lenders.loan_because: This is a fun and awesome way to have a positive impact in the world.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I loan because much has been lent to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small middle school in a predominantly Latino community.  Our children are bright, dedicated and have little money for education.  We see to it that they go on to private high schools on scholarships and eventually go to University.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I've worked in microfinance for nearly ten years and know it helps low-income people better manage their lives.  Kiva is a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Work with microfinance institutions so they can make more loans to more more people worldwide

lenders.name: Jennifer and the girls
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  We should give them money so they won't be poor and not get enough food. Economy is tight and we want to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom is a corporate lawyer, older daughter is in 5th grade and is a "good looking goof" (self-described), younger daughter is in 1st grade and likes school; her favorite color is blue.

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: fundraising is never easy, especially when you have to ask strangers for help
lenders.occupational_info: I sell medical product to doctors to help them treat their patients

lenders.name: Frannie
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I see the potential for others to be able to live their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I wear many hats, but I primarily divide my time between urban farming (fruits, veggies, honey, eggs) and creative endeavors.

lenders.name: Emily Maroutian
lenders.loan_because: Giving is the ultimate expression of gratitude for a blessed life.
lenders.occupational_info: Author and writer

lenders.name: Money Smarts 4 Kids
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to provide venture capital to an entrepreneur. Where else can $25 provide that experience.
lenders.occupational_info: Our mission is to help promote financial literacy to young people. Part of this process is helping other people along the way.

lenders.name: renee
lenders.loan_because: People need access to capital to run a business.

lenders.name: aurora
lenders.loan_because: i need a loan for my daughters education, i need loan because travel business is slow in Boracay Island.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a free lance tour operator residing in the island and i survive through referrals i would appreciate it if community groups could help me in this aspect, good for seminars and or individual travellers.
